welcome_message_body: Welcome to Karaikandi, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage, vibrant markets, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!

terminals.description: The main terminal at Kumbhirgram Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.
